message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. I believe it's a fair price given its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $13,500. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to consider.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, I'm still looking for a price closer to $14,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,750? I'm confident this price remains fair for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I've considered your proposal and am willing to meet you halfway at $13,625. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
